content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThere is not too much difference between Desktop Application Testing and Mobile Application Testing, we use the same Testing strategies and here we are going to talk about the kind of testing and considerations that we need to know when we want to start doing Mobile Testing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIn the same way we found a variety of Desktop specifications, on Mobile is the same history, we can find different processors, Internal and RAM memory, Screen/Monitor sizes and Operative Systems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWhen we are testing Desktop Applications, generally we know the minimum requirements for an Application and which common resolutions are available. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rScreen size and Resolution\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHere is the first difference, on desktop apps, we know the resolutions supported or recommended. On Mobile devices, we found different aspect ratios, resolutions and screen sizes and the approach is to cover all this variety on a single app. For this, we have to Test on Tablets and different Smart Phone screen sizes to verify if the app is displayed correctly.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":26616,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f725eff6-4c3a-4957-94c9-81f0fdf87b9e/new.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f725eff6-4c3a-4957-94c9-81f0fdf87b9e/new.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"new.png\",\"name\":\"new.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f725eff6-4c3a-4957-94c9-81f0fdf87b9e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":664,\"height\":565},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Screen Orientation\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOn Mobiles, we need to check that application is displayed correctly when we change the screen orientation between Portrait to Landscape. Not all applications allow changes to the view when we change the Orientation of the device, but this is a must to test on Mobile devices, we can find many crashes by doing this simple test.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":60574,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/111956e7-bdca-4ab8-90b4-ce0266f4b113/n2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/111956e7-bdca-4ab8-90b4-ce0266f4b113/n2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"n2.png\",\"name\":\"n2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"111956e7-bdca-4ab8-90b4-ce0266f4b113\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":616,\"height\":405},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Interruptions\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOn Smart Phones we need to test the app behavior when we receive a call. Application will go to the background and we need to verify that everything continues running smooth when we return to the app.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":43953,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/77e3868b-62a9-43ba-9c01-13c8107bc253/n3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/77e3868b-62a9-43ba-9c01-13c8107bc253/n3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"n3.jpg\",\"name\":\"n3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"77e3868b-62a9-43ba-9c01-13c8107bc253\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":281,\"height\":593},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also we have interruptions every time that an app sends a Push notification.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rInputs\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOn Desktop we use by default Keyboard and Mouse. On Mobiles we moved from physical keyboards to onscreen keyboards due the Touchscreens. Also, some of the Physical buttons like the Home button have been removed and added some onscreen solutions which change the behavior of app on the screen. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":42020,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cc8b3198-3745-4876-a96e-d2dedeea6241/n4.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cc8b3198-3745-4876-a96e-d2dedeea6241/n4.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"n4.jpg\",\"name\":\"n4.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cc8b3198-3745-4876-a96e-d2dedeea6241\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":425,\"height\":171},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":59942,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b83c03b6-83cd-4c95-94c6-6144e47023cd/n5.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b83c03b6-83cd-4c95-94c6-6144e47023cd/n5.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"n5.jpg\",\"name\":\"n5.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b83c03b6-83cd-4c95-94c6-6144e47023cd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":249,\"height\":539},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
